During a visit to the Hyde Park Academy in the city, several teenage girls were drawn to Prince Harry with one asking him to eat Chicago’s famous style of pizza.

She said: “When Prince Harry’s here, he eats Chicago — make sure he has a pizza.”

To which the royal revealed his shocking dietary revelation.

He replied: “I had pizza last night. I don’t even eat pizza anymore, but I had pizza last night.
title: Prince Harry ‘does not normally eat this food' – but makes exception in Chicago

meta_data.description: PRINCE Harry has revealed another secret about his dietary habits while attending an event for the Obama Foundation Summit in Chicago.
